thread.title: Beyoncé Is Having A 'Harder Time' With This Pregnancy
thread.title_full: Beyoncé Is Having A 'Harder Time' With This Pregnancy

author: Perez Hilton
title: Beyoncé Is Having A 'Harder Time' With This Pregnancy

organizations.name: bey posts new baby bump photos

text:
Beyoncé 's a fighter!
We can't imagine her energy ever flagging, but according to an insider, the singer is having some overall difficulties with this pregnancy.
Related: Bey Posts New Baby Bump Photos 
A source speaking exclusively to E! News said that she's having a "harder time this pregnancy with keeping up her energy."
However, the insider was also quick to add that Bey is enjoying herself right now, saying:
"She loves being pregnant."
Aww! We bet! It must be a thrill knowing she's going to give Blue Ivy Carter two new siblings!
Moreover, while the soon-to-be mom of three is still keeping up a healthy diet, she's also giving herself a break every once in a while.
The source said: 
"She splurges when she wants to and hasn't taken her weight gain as a negative thing. She is a confident women in her skin whatever size she is [and] embraces it."
It was also revealed that the Carters know the sex of their twins, but are obviously keeping mum. We wouldn't expect otherwise!
As for things in marriage land, everything is all good, as the insider admitted:
"The love [between Jay Z and Beyoncé] is authentic and real. Jay is a good dad and husband. He'd do anything for Bey."
How can you not be when you're married to an actual queen??? Jay better keep it 100.
[ Image via Instagram . ]
